contentfulCollection.seoDescription: Our mission is simple: travel the world’s factories finding the nicest things, for the lowest prices. Join our mailing list if you want to hear when we find them.
contentfulCollection.name: Gifts $101 - $150

content.value: Our mission is simple: travel the world’s factories finding the nicest things, for the lowest prices. Join our mailing list if you want to hear when we find them.
High quality essentials with a super approachable price tag.
Gifts he'll love. High quality basics without breaking the bank.
Spurce up any home for less. Because they deserve it.

products.title: Diamond Line Ring
products.seoDescription:
Make a statement. This ring has 6 conflict-free, ethically sourced excellent cut diamonds set in prongs to show off their beauty and shine. Perfect on it's own or stacked with your other favorites. 

Handmade of 6 excellent cut diamonds set in pure 14k ye

products.title: Luxe Baby Cashmere Sweatshirt
products.seoDescription: A new twist on our best-selling cashmere sweatshirt. Made from 100% super-soft, ultra-rare baby cashmere, this may just be the softest sweatshirt you'll ever feel.

products.title: Diamond Bezel Open Ring
products.seoDescription: Made from solid 14k gold and featuring two 0.03 carat ethically sourced diamonds, this diamond bezel open ring will surely get attention. Pairs perfectly with our stacker rings, beaded rings and more.

products.title: Solo Diamond Bezel Ring
products.seoDescription:
Your new go-to for every occasion, this ring has a gorgeous diamond in a bezeled setting made of 14k gold. 

Handmade of pure 14k yellow gold, giving these studs a beautiful hue and durability that lasts a lifetime. This ring will not oxidize or discolor.

All Quince diamonds, including this one, are ethically sourced and conflict-free
